verses.name: Hebrews 11:19
verses.text: Accounting that God was able to raise him up, even from the dead; from whence also he received him in a figure.

verses.name: Hebrews 11:20
verses.text: By faith Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau concerning things to come.

verses.name: Hebrews 11:21
verses.text: By faith Jacob, when he was a dying, blessed both the sons of Joseph; and worshipped, leaning upon the top of his staff.

verses.name: Hebrews 11:22
verses.text: By faith Joseph, when he died, made mention of the departing of the children of Israel; and gave commandment concerning his bones.
